fields.summary: iPhone Runtime error on Community example app.
fields.environment:
www.macincloud.com - Lion 10.8.4 

Titanium Studio 3.1.1.2.x (Current pr 24. of oct 2013)

comments.body:
Hello Peter Lindhard,

Please add your test code and test case for testing. Without test code itâ€™s very difficult to solve issue. 

Thanks

Unedited Import of the Titans Community App in the github link, as referred to in best practice in the documentation. 

It might be, that the template is not updated for the NavigationWindow class in 3.x SDK. 

The issue is with the template, and I've worked around it. Maybe just close this?
Closing it as per updates from Peter.
